Text:
Thank you! This rip has to be opened in a player where the wrong aspect can be adjusted, like the VLC player.
http://www.videolan.org/
The ripper has not masked correctly, so a lot of quality is wasted on the black frame around the picture.

Miserable encoding:
 - Wrong Aspect Ratio
 - Huge Black Bars
 - Wired In swedish subtitles.
How long will it take to the Northern encoders (mostly Dutch and swedish) to learn how to use soft subtitles ? ( Srt, sub, etc..)
